daysOfWeek

Array private

Defined in addon/components/tt-date-picker.js:129

An Ember.Array containing an object for each day of the week. Each object has a name property that is used for the day title.

numberOfWeeks

Integer private

Defined in addon/components/tt-date-picker.js:75

The number of week rows to display in the calendar.

output

String

Defined in addon/components/tt-date-picker.js:85

Output

Options:

  • date - javascript Date object.
  • timestamp - number of seconds.
  • object - Ember.Object with year, month and date properties.

Default: 'date'
